OrgName.entry: THERAPEUTIC SUPPORT GROUPS - JACKI PRITCHARD LTD

Desc.entry: Jacki Pritchard Ltd is a limited company which offers independent social work, training and consultancy - specialising in the field of adult abuse, protection of vulnerable adults and safeguarding adults. Therapeutic support groups are set up for adults who have been abused, either in childhood or adulthood. The groups have a maximum of six people. Sessions are time limited: six 2-hour sessions. The groups are run by two workers: a social worker registered with the General Social Care Council; and an experienced facilitator for survivors of abuse. Costs approx Â£35 per hour (plus VAT). Self or any referral.
